src:
Timnas U-19: Harapan Fajar Fathur untuk Laga Lawan Hongkong
06 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- Berhasil mencetak dua gol dalam laga melawan Timor Leste, penyerang Timnas U-19, Muhammad Fajar Fathur, mengatakan mereka perlu memperbaiki penyelesaian akhir dalam laga melawan Hong Kong. Ia menyebutkan dalam laga melawan Timor Leste banyak peluang yang harusnya menjadi gol terbuang sia-sia. "Melawan Hong Kong kita harap bisa memperbaiki semua dan mencuri banyak gol," kata dia di Stadion Madya, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 Oktober 2019.
Tim Nasional Indonesia U-19 atau Timnas U-19 akan menghadapi Hongkong U-19 pada laga kedua Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 di Stadion Madya, Gelora Bung Karno, Senayan, Jakarta, pada Jumat, 8 November 2019.
Kemenangan 3-1 atas Timor Leste U-19 pada laga pertama, Rabu, 6 November, menjadi modal penting bagi tim asuhan Fakhri Husaini untuk menghadapi laga kedua. Berkat kemenangan ini, untuk sementara, Indonesia menempati puncak klasmen grup K dengan 3 poin.
Hong Kong U-19 sebelumnya bermain imbang 1-1 melawan Korea Utara U-19 pada Rabu malam, 6 November. Hasil ini membuat Korea Utara menempati urutan kedua dan Hong Kong ketiga klasemen grup K. Sedangkan Timor Leste berada di juru kunci grup dengan 0 poin dalam kualifikasi Piala Asia U-19 2020 ini.

IRSYAN HASYIM
text:
U-19 national team: Fajar Fajar's hope for the match against Hong Kong
06 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- Successfully scored two goals in the match against Timor Leste, U-19 national team striker Muhammad Fajar Fathur said they needed to improve the final settlement in the match against Hong Kong. He mentioned that in the match against Timor Leste there were many opportunities that should have been a goal wasted. "Against Hong Kong we hope to improve everything and steal a lot of goals," he said at Madya Stadium, Jakarta, Wednesday, October 6, 2019.
Indonesian U-19 National Team or U-19 national team will face Hong Kong U-19 in the second match of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup at Madya Stadium, Gelora Bung Karno, Senayan, Jakarta, on Friday, November 8, 2019.
The 3-1 victory over Timor Leste U-19 in the first match, Wednesday, November 6, became an important capital for Fakhri Husaini's team to face the second match. Thanks to this victory, for a while, Indonesia topped Group K with 3 points.
Hong Kong U19s previously drew 1-1 against North Korea U19s on Wednesday night, November 6. This result makes North Korea ranked second and Hong Kong third in Group K. while East Timor is in the group's caretaker with 0 points in this 2020 U-19 Asian Cup qualification.

IRSYAN HASYIM
